name: HBL - Breaking The Wall (old)
description:
This style will make the content of hidden (padlocked) news articles visible. Note: additional actions are required, so please read the Notes for instructions.

Note: as of 2016 this style is no longer working as HBL redesigned their webpage. I'm leaving it up for archive purposes and inspiration for new styles.
additional_info: In addition to this style you will need to add the following AdBlock filter to block the redirect to login page: ||hbl.fi/sites/all/themes/hbl2013/paywall-content.html (copy-paste it) For some reason that line is all that is needed for Firefox, but not for Chrome (unless you block javascripts)! For Chrome you will also need the following AdBlock filter: ||login.hbl.fi/credit/user/hblwebb (copy-paste it) This will however block the login/comment function. You should also turn off the option "Count filter hits" in AdBlock, since this will use a lot of cpu when the java-script in the webpage will retry the blocked request above in an infinite loop! Please leave a comment if you know a way to fix this (blocking the source script without crippling the webpage). Note: Both the style and the block filter are needed! ..you should now be able to read hidden (padlocked content). Pleasant reading!
